sentences.en: A federal marshal was killed in a shoot-out.
sentences.cn: 枪战中一名联邦警察局局长身亡。

sentences.en: Air Chief Marshal Sir Robin Hall
sentences.cn: 空军上将罗宾∙霍尔爵士
空军少将安德鲁∙伯恩斯

sentences.en: He acted as grand marshal of a stock car race.
sentences.cn: 他担任过改装赛车大赛的主持人。

sentences.en: He will have been pleased by Marshal Yazov's assurance of the armed forces' loyalty.
sentences.cn: 当亚佐夫元帅向他保证武装部队的忠诚时，他会感到心满意足的。
辩论前整理一下你的论点.

sentences.en: That same afternoon the marshal appeared with two brawny assistants.
sentences.cn: 当天下午,警长带着两名身强力壮的助手来了.

sentences.en: The company turned its attention to marshalling its creditors' approval.
sentences.cn: 这家公司把注意力转向了集结债权人的支持。

sentences.en: The fire marshal directed the hook - and - ladder units.
sentences.cn: 消防队长指挥云梯消防队.

sentences.en: the Marshal of the Royal Air force
The marshal rode at the head of the parade.
sentences.cn: 典礼官在检阅队伍的前面骑马行进.

sentences.en: The Marshal stepped over the vacuum-cleaner and stumped out of the room.
sentences.cn: 元帅迈过真空吸尘器，脚步沉重地走出了房间。

sentences.en: The marshal was thinking there might have been a murder.
sentences.cn: 警察局长认为可能发生了谋杀案.

sentences.en: Zhukov was a marshal of the former Soviet Union.
sentences.cn: 朱可夫是前苏联的一位元帅.

words.tran_cn: 元帅；典礼官；执法官；法官的随行官员（等于judge's marshal）
各就各位；按次序排列成形（等于marshal）

trans.tran_cn: 元帅，典礼官，执法官，消防局长
trans.tran_en: an officer of the highest rank in the army or air force of some countries

trans.tran_cn: 整理， 安排， 排列
trans.tran_en: to organize your thoughts, ideas etc so that they are clear, effective, or easy to understand
to organize your thoughts, ideas etc so that they are clear, effective, or easy to understand
